Quick Estimates for Bricklayers

Snap a photo, enter one dimension, and get AI-powered material and labour estimates in seconds. Built for UK tradespeople.

How It Works

1. Snap a Photo

Take or upload a photo of the job site. Our AI analyses the image to understand the scope of work.

2. Enter Dimensions

Provide one anchor dimension (length or height) to help calibrate the estimate.

3. Get Estimate

Receive instant estimates for bricks, materials, labour hours, and recommended pricing.

Built for Real Builders

  • Practical estimates based on UK standards
  • Save jobs and generate PDF quotes
  • Works on phone, tablet, and desktop

Supports All Job Types

Brickwork

New brick walls and structures

Blockwork

Block wall construction

Repointing

Mortar joint restoration

Demo+Rebuild

Full demolition and rebuild

Join hundreds of bricklayers using AI to quote faster and more accurately.
